name: My first game in unity / Primul Joc in Unity
name_original: My first game in unity / Primul Joc in Unity
description:
ENG:

In this game you are a cube and you need to jump on the platforms and collect the Diamond. I did this game after i completed some tutorials on youtube and i made one simple game. When you download this game don't expect to be complex, it is just one level where you jump around and collect the coins.

Please give a sugestion for this game or other games!

ROU:

In acest joc esti un cub si trebuie sa sari pe platforme si sa colectezi diamantul.

Lasati o sugestie pentru acest joc sau pentru alt joc!
